meanings.definition: Assembled or edited into a montage.
meanings.sent1: The montaged photos in the album captured our vacation perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed her montaged artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The montaged scenes from the movie made us laugh at the unexpected combinations.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit was like a montaged masterpiece of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The montaged images on the screen told a beautiful story without words.

meanings.definition: Combined or arranged in a montage.
meanings.sent1: We admired the montaged pictures on the wall of memories.
meanings.sent2: The montaged clips in the video highlighted the best moments of the event.
meanings.sent3: The montaged music tracks created a unique and enjoyable listening experience.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was a montaged mix of humor and heartfelt gratitude.
meanings.sent5: The montaged scenes in the film took us on a visual journey through time.
